body: I'm just curious. If we are keeping the TH code, why can't we just call TH `_gesv_single` here? Is this code doing something different with the TH gesv, or is it here so that migrating the entire thing to ATen will be easier?
body_html: I'm just curious. If we are keeping the TH code, why can't we just call TH _gesv_single here? Is this code doing something different with the TH gesv, or is it here so that migrating the entire thing to ATen will be easier?
